subject: Help plz...
msgSnippet: Hi, Just go thro this program, it does not run for negative test and how must the runtime bug must be fixed. Plz suggest me a solution. regards chandu /*
messageBody:
Hi,

Just go thro this program, it does not run for negative test
and how must the runtime bug must be fixed.

Plz suggest me a solution.

regards
chandu

/* LanguageVector.java
*/
/* Proram that stores that adds element in Vector
inserts a element at a specified position and displays */

import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;
class LanguageVector
{
static Vector list = new Vector();
static int length;
public static void main(String args[])
{
length= args.length;
System.out.println("The size args.length ="+length);
for (int i=0; i<length ; i++)
{
list.addElement(args[i]);
}
list.insertElementAt("COBOL",2);
int size= list.size();
System.out.println("The size list.size() ="+size);
String listArray[]=new String[size];
list.copyInto(listArray);
System.out.println("List of Languages");
for (int i=0; i<size ; i++)
{
System.out.println(listArray[i]);
}

}
}



/* Test Program TestLanguageVector.java*/
/* This programs fails when i run a negative test. Plz go thro the comments i
have typed */


import junit.framework.*;
import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;
class TestLanguageVector extends TestCase {
LanguageVector langvect =new LanguageVector();
public void testlangvect(){
System.out.println("value of langvect.length"+langvect.length);
assertEquals(2,langvect.length);
/* the assert fails when i give other value than 2, and the program throws
exception and stops, the next assertion is not tested and no FALIURE mssg is
given.*/
assertEquals("COBOL",langvect.list.elementAt(2));
}

public static Test suite(){
return new TestSuite("TestLanguageVector.class");
}


public static void main(String args[])
{

String params[] = {"TOMCAT","EJB"};
/*I passs parameters to the main () of LanguageVector.java */
LanguageVector.main(params);
/*1.If the below two stmts are not added the testlangvect() is not
getting innitaited */
/*2. If I run negative test the Faliure msg is not displayed
the program stops after throwing the first Exception */

TestLanguageVector testlangVector= new TestLanguageVector();
testlangVector.testlangvect();

junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
System.out.println("Test Stmt");
}
}
